question:
You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. 
You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.
Write a letter to yur neighbour. In your letter
introduce yourself
describe your plans for the party
invite your neigbhour to come
text: I hope this mail finds you well.

My name is May live in House A in the Victoria area. Recently, I just move to this zone on  02 Jan 2011.  I am planning to arrange a housewarming party with my friends on 14 Jan 2011 starting from 13:00PM.

I am planning to invite all my relatives, colleagues, friends and neighbours to the Victoria area, which will be around 50 people to have a gathering on that day. My housewarming gathering will have 3 sections. We will arrange a BBQ party for the lunch section that is started from 13:00, my husband and I will well-prepared meats and soft drinks. Thus, we will arrange some games for kids in my basement. We will have short break between 16:00 to 17:00. Hence, we will arrange order some Japanese foods and pizza for our dinner. For drinks, we will prepare wines and apple cider.

I would like to invite you to join our housewarming party. I know that Ms. Smith's family have lived in the Victoria area over a decade. I love to know more about the history of the Victoria, which can let our family can be adopted into Victoria neighborhood quicker.
Looking forward to see you on 14 Jan 2011.
